blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Recall the types of sales-related information required for effective planning.
Explain the importance of using sales-related information in planning and implementing activities.
Use sales-related information to develop a sales plan.
Identify components of an effective sales plan based on sales data.
Assess the effectiveness of a sales plan based on sales outcomes.
Design a comprehensive sales plan that incorporates various sales-related information.
Recall the key features of the sales technology systems used.
Explain how to check the quality, validity, and reliability of stored information.
Demonstrate how to store information on sales technology systems.
Evaluate stored data for its accuracy and relevance.
Make informed decisions based on the analysis of the information in the technology systems.
Develop a system for maintaining up-to-date sales information.
Identify the tools and technologies used for the automation of sales tasks.
Explain the advantages of automation in sales activities.
Utilize automation tools to carry out specific sales-related tasks.
Break down a sales process and identify opportunities for automation.
Assess the impact of automation on sales effectiveness.
Design a workflow that incorporates automation technology for sales activities.
Recall the methods of sharing sales-related information within a team.
Describe the importance of collaboration among sales team members.
Demonstrate effective communication strategies in sharing sales information.
Evaluate the effectiveness of communication within the sales team.
Assess collaborative strategies and their impact on team performance.
Develop a strategy for improving collaboration and information sharing among sales team members.
Recall the process of lead generation and qualification.
Explain the importance of qualifying leads in the sales process.
Use lead generation automation technology to identify and qualify leads.
Analyze the criteria for prioritizing leads based on sales targets.
Justify the approach taken to qualify and prioritize leads.
Design a lead generation strategy that includes automation tools.
Identify the types of reports generated from sales systems.
Explain the role of sales reporting in performance management.
Generate a report summarizing sales-related information for management.
Evaluate the data included in sales reports for actionable insights.
Assess the effectiveness of reporting tools and their impact on decision making.
Design a reporting template that captures key sales metrics.
Recall the elements of monitoring personal sales performance.
Explain the importance of feedback in personal development within sales.
Implement a self-monitoring technique for evaluating sales performance.
Assess one's own performance against established sales targets.
Critique feedback received on performance for improvement.
Develop a personal development plan based on feedback and performance metrics.
